content.summary: Saw it with my class and school teacher 1978

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around 0015 hours to the front porch to smoke. i sat on the glider looking down the street. i live on a cul-de-sac and had an unobstructed view down the middle of the street and into the west sky. within a couple minutes while looking at the stars to the west (it was a very cold clear night), i witnessed a bright green orb materialize at approximately a forty-five degree angle approximately 700 - 1000 feet from my position. the orb grew from a golf ball size to a basketball size while hovering for approximately 10 to 15 seconds. the object suddenly darted to the south on the same plane (approximately 500 feet in two seconds) and disintegrated leaving an orange trail of fire as if it exploded, but i heard no noise. there was no trail of fire or smoke as it traveled south and it kept the same perfectly round shape until it exploded. i have no idea what it could have been. it was definitely not fireworks or a power surge as there are no power lines that far off the ground or in that direction.
content.summary: Green orb appeared , hovered traveled south and about 500 ft and disintegrated

content.detailedDescription: Look i'm 21 one years old as during this time i had the same dream over and over again witch i have never had happen and in this dream there was a bright light out my window ano i couldnt even look at it but each time i checked my alarm clock and it was always between 3 and 4 and during this ligh showing up i always go to my front door witch is right next to my bedroom at the time  and i always look out the window and see a smaller sized being its body valor was grey green it was rather thin and tall that's what i ment by small and when i see this creature i start to here relaxing music and i here everything is going to be ok then when i go to turn my door nob handle to walk out my door i have no idea what happens after that and it scares me cause i have had more then just this encounter that my boyfriend chadwick can account for we have been together for 6 years and we are about to be married i'm not a bid media person but i need to talk about what i exsperienced that hole two weeks it still won't leav my minde pleas feel free to contact me i have nothing to hide i even have a year old some witch i was pregnant with during this encounter
content.summary: I had the same dream for two weeks straight and each time i had the dream the creature moved so slowley it was so eligent and in my head i can a beautiful music and i tryed to open my door and the next thing i know i don't remember anything.

content.detailedDescription: On last day of vacation i look up and saw something but did not know what it was.
content.summary: White with yellow glow

content.detailedDescription:
This happened a long time ago yet i remember it like it was yesterday. i was about 12 y/o.And my friend about 15. after watching your hanger 1 show many times i felt compelled to file this report.
one day after dinner a friend and i went fishing on the beach at low tide. when it began to get dark (about 8pm) we decided to go home. we walked about a 1/4 mile to the opening of the sea wall to our street. as we walked up to exit, we both looked up to see a large craft hovering feet above the wet beach sand about 1/4 mile away. 
 
the craft was very large i would say about 6" - 8" wide from our perspective. i would guess that would equal nearly 75'-100' in diameter. 
it was disc shaped a dull grey metallic color with concave outer edges which sloped inward making it wider on the bottom than on the top. on the top deck there was a smaller dome like object in the center. the outer edges of the craft had port holes like structures that pulsed with yellow/ white lights that flashed sequentially around the craft. the dome on the top had smaller lights and there was a much smaller dome beneath the craft with lights. 

it seemed like several minutes that we observed the craft, but in reality it was more like 5-10 seconds. without a sound it rose higher to about 100'off the ground shifting position several hundred feet now facing east. as it continued to rise the front of the craft tipped to a 45 degree angle and what looked like a lightening bolt of bright light ranging from pure white to yellow to almost orange the craft vanished. the entire process of departure took maybe 2 seconds. 

we looked at one another with amazement and fear. we ran home (100 yards)and told our parents. naturally they laughed at the prospects that we saw a ufo. we were insistent that we saw something we had never seen before. we knew it was a ufo. i remember my father reading the news paper the following day, and in the paper there was a report of a police officer further away wrote that he saw something that evening. i believe he took a photograph (which was in the paper) as it departed which showed up as a negative because it was so bright. our parents retracted what they said to us the night before since a police officer saw it too.  

this part of the beach is used by many people at all times of the day. there were over a dozen people walking that area at the same time we witnessed the object. it would be highly unlikely that they did not see the craft since most were closer to it than we were. i believe some were within yards of it.

after that encounter we(many people)sitting on the beach at night would see small red balls of light streaking across the surface of the ocean almost nightly. it became the thing to do at night. go to the beach and watch the red balls. the orbs would cover incredible distances (about 10 miles) in mere seconds. they would then join up to form a single larger sphere and rise into the night sky and become a bright star.
 indistinguishable from the millions of others. this occurred many times for many years. one night we(5-10 people) sitting on the beach having a bonfire witnessed a very large brilliant object rising behind eagle island about 2 miles off shore. it was about 9ish and getting dark. one of the adults said it was the planet venus. i was about 14-15 at the time and knew better that it wasn't venus. as it rose above the island it became obvious that it was larger than the island was long about 1/4 mile. it too rose slowly into the night sky and within a few minutes looked like another star, yet it moved with incredible speed and made several sharp angular turns. we never saw the lights again after that.

i do not have a any drawing of the craft, but as a trained artist i could easily do one.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc shape with concave outer edges dome like structure on top

content.detailedDescription: The year was 1990 i was 12, accompanied by my cousin, around anniston alabama, not far from tallidega speedway.  i was at my grandpa's house walking across the driveway to my uncle's house. before going inside we stopped to talk and as we were standing outside we noticed the tree in front of us moving as though the wind were blowing, but there was no wind, just a hot, calm night. the shaking of the leaves made us look up and we noticed that directly above us we could not see any stars and we could hear a sound like the wind but no other trees were moving and there was no breeze. we thought it was weird at first but continued to talk for a moment, we looked back up a few moments later and saw what looked like the back end of a ship from a star wars movie but the craft itself seemed to be cloaked in darkness. we saw what looked like a propulsion system or thrusters of some kind on the rear of the craft and as the craft slowly moved over us we could only make out the shape of the back end of it, it resembled an elongated hexagon. then suddenly from the front of the craft a beam of some kind that looked like blue/white lightening or electricity shot out of it, toward the horizon and the beam seemed to open and form some kind of square shaped opening or portal in the sky. when the beam shot out it illuminated the front end of the craft and i could tell it was pointed and about 60 to 70 feet long and about 20 feet wide. i could see purple and pink gas clouds in the opening, it was like looking through a window into a different place. the craft began to make a sound like it was building up energy and then went into the opening so fast it was nothing more than a streak of light , like warp speed. then the opening closed, i don't know how else to describe it other than it looked like an old tv turning off, and it was gone. the entire encounter from beginning to end was about 6 minutes. my cousin and i looked at each other and without saying anything we ran in to my uncle's house and tried to tell our family what we had seen, but they didn't know what to think. they tried to explain it away as an overactive imagination and to many si-fi movies, but after years of contemplating the encounter i know what i saw that night was real and that the story needed to be shared with someone who would believe it really happened and take it seriously. my uncle who was the most skeptical of our encounter at the time has now, years later, recanted his opinion and now admits that he has since seen something similar and now believes our story. since that day i have been a believer and i teach my children that we are not alone in the universe.
content.summary: Craft was above us directly moving out over us we saw the propulsion . the it shot a laser / electric beam that opens a worm hole flew right through.

content.detailedDescription:
It was shortly after my family had moved to huntsville, alabama in 1965 when the sighting occurred. i don't remember the exact date - sometime around 1966-1967 at around 7:00 am during breakfast. i noticed what initially appeared to be steam escaping from the rocket testing tower located on the redstone arsenal a little more than a mile away over the tree line. the tower stood around 30-40 feet above the trees from our view point. we had never seen steam coming from that tower before, so it caught our attention. as we watched it, it occurred to us that it was circling the tower and looked exactly the same during each rotation. it was a disk, white on one side and grey on the other. it was circling the testing tower at about a 45 degree angle at the top of the tower and appeared to be approximately 1/2-2/3 the size of the tower. it rotated perfectly the same at about 1 revolution per 1-2 seconds for around 5 minutes when i went to get my binoculars to get a closer look. unfortunately that is when i was told by my father that it had leveled out and disappeared over the tree tops. we don't have the technology to maneuver like that today let alone in 1967.

present was myself (11-12 years old), my father, my mother and my younger brother (7-8 years old). my older brother was down stairs at the time and heard the commotion but didn't get upstairs in time to witness it. my mother is now deceased. unfortunately my father says he doesn't remember this incident. at the time he was working with nasa and may have been told this incident never happened and if he swears to secrecy that is exactly what he will do. 

this may not have been my first sighting though. in san diego, ca when i was 5-6 years old on christmas eve 1959-1960 when i was in bed trying to get to sleep in anticipation of christmas morning, i looked out my bedroom window and saw stationary lights circling in the sky. i got out of bed and ran to tell my parents that santa was there. that was when i discovered there was no such thing as santa claus.
content.summary: White/grey disk circling at 45 degrees around rocket testing tower at redstone arsenal

content.detailedDescription: I was washing dished and looked out the kitchen window over the sink and saw white, circular lights, about 7 to 8 spread out with some movement. i dropped what i was doing and ran out to our balcony and tried to take pictures but none came out. than as they started disappearing i got some video. i can make them out if i zoom in and they emit a flash than blink on and off. after i stopped filming and watched to the end of the event the lights did converge into a longer light, like a pill or cigar and disappeared behind the clouds. i did have a strange calm during this event and felt as if time was standing still.
content.summary: Blinking white lights, circular over oakland airport, well above cloud level

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my mothers porch in altoona pa, it was a quiet summer night when i noticed across the street the railroad tracks i seen lights moving very slow like gliding strangely with no sound at all, i couldnt believe what i was seeing but it didnt make me nervous at all but more like mesmerizing me to it to watch it. i watched it till it went further down the tracks till i no longer could see it, it was just so strange, i wish i would of followed it in my car but i didnt want to lose site of it, till this day at night i always look over the tracks in that area as if i waiting for something to come back, i know i seen this,i will never forget it!1
content.summary: A ball with lights not bright quiet moving slow

content.detailedDescription:
This is not so much what i saw but what i recorded. i was on phone talking to someone snd was intetrupted by what sounds like a conversation bit not with human voices. i listened for about minute and a half the recorded for two minutes before i had to hang up. when i called person i was talking to back she stated she heard the same thing.
i wish someone could listen to recording and give me some idea as to ehat it is
content.summary: None

content.detailedDescription:
We were on the menastash ridge elk hunting in our open camp (no tent or camper) when my husband was howling at the coyotes and they were answering back.  all of a sudden it got really quiet then we saw this ufo above the trees.  it came over very slowly and quietly with lights around the underside.  it was so big it blocked out all the stars and got really dark.  we got so scared, we jumped into the front of our truck, rolled coats up in the windows, locked the doors and that's pretty much all we remember until we woke up the next morning after daylight.  neither one of us remember going to sleep or dreaming.  after being together for about 1 1/2 years without birth control, i ended up pregnant on that hunting trip and had a wonderful, healthy boy exactly 9 months later.  i was shocked when i found out i was pregnant.  

we both would be very interested in hypnotism to see if anything happened between the time we got in the truck to the time we woke up.  it's pretty much haunted us since.  we never reported it because we were pretty sure people would think we were off our nut, but have talked about it to family and friends over the years.  

have there been any other reported sightings in that area in 1980?
content.summary: It came over the top of our camp and scared us.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch playing guitar.  the first week of march was really warm that year.  out of no where a chrome triangle shaped craft with three bright lights in each corner appeared.  it was flying in a straight line due north.  i appeared for several seconds then disappeared, then reapeared about about 30 feet further north for a few more seconds and the disappeared again.  at that point i ran inside and grabbed my video camera, then came back outside in an attempt to film it.  unfortionately, i did not witness it again that night, or any other night since.  the craft seemed to be made out of stainless steel, chrome or mercury.  it appeared more like mercury then anything else.  it was like the craft emitted light and reflected it at the same time.  i would say that it was no higher than 800 feet.  i can only guess the size of the craft because i'm not sure how far away it really was, but i would say each side of the craft was at least 90 feet long.  it was a perfct triangle.  the shape can only be compaired to the triangle thing you set the balls with when playing pool.  i did have my video camera on and filming an empty sky for about an hour.  like i said i did not see it again so i did not catch any visual evidence.  however, my video camera was making a wierd noise that i have never heard it do before or sence.  it was a high frequency electronic sound, hard to explain.  when i reviewed the film a few days later i realized that the recording had clicks or taps in the audio in the same spot of the film that i heard the high pitched noise when i was filming.  i thought maybe it is morrase code or something so i downloading free morrase code decoding software and looped back the audio of the film through the software.  when the tapping started on the recording the software picked up letters.  when the recording was over i ended up with about a paragraph worth of radom letters that i could not make any sense of.
content.summary: Chrome triangle, white light in each corner.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back home from a visit with my sister.  it was late evening but the sun was still out and the sky was a brilliant blue.  a huge white, billowy cumulus cloud was in the south west, all by itself in an otherwise clear sky.  it was like a big thunderhead, but very white.  it caught my eye as i was driving, and i stopped the car alongside the road for a few minutes to look at it.  then a small flash of silver appeared under the cloud.  i thought it was a small plane at first, glinting in the sun.  but as i watched, i saw it was round, and was not moving like a plane.  it moved slowly forward, then went backwards pretty fast.  it stayed still for a moment, then went forward a again, like it was measuring the cloud or something!  as i watched, it went up into the cloud for a second, then back down under it.  i had to go on home, so i do not know how long it was playing around that strange cloud.  very odd experience!  it was far enough away that i couldn't have taken a picture even if i had my camera with me. i am just curious if anyone else saw what i did that day tuesday, june 16, 2015 in bon aqua, tn...
content.summary: {rjl} a silver orb going back and forth under a giant, white oddly shaped cloud.  the sky was totally clear blue except for the odd cloud.

content.detailedDescription: It was just starting to become dusk outside, and i was sitting inside our apartment by our phone, looking out the window beside the stairs leading to the third floor of the building. we lived across the street from a city park with a church by one of it's entrances. it was still fairly light outside, enough to notice that there was a triangular shaped object hovering in the sky as i looked over the top of the church (though not directly over the church). it had red lights pulsating along the two edges that i could see from my vantage point (i could swear that they pulsed into blue-ish/green-ish, too, but they were mostly red). it hovered in place for probably 20-30 minutes, and then it ascended straight up at an incredible speed until it disappeared from my sight.
content.summary: Triangle craft in the sky in east walpole

content.detailedDescription: My husband daughter and i drove down a dark dirt road to observe the northern lights on june 23rd 2015. we had been there for awhile when we all saw an orb coming from the south it was arching across the sky.It was much larger than a star and it had a soft glow to it. we watched it for at least 10 minutes if not more. it arched as far north as we could see. we were discussing what the heck it could have been. when we saw 2 small bright lights coming at us. they were moving up and down and side to side. one just disappeared but the other was coming towards us. it wasn't very far off the ground but it was hard to tell how far away it was. i said if it gets any closer that i am leaving.It to just disappeared. when i got home i went on facebook and was commenting on the northern lights and people where talking about seeing an orb. people as far away as grand marie had seen it. and people in lakeville where talking about the lights. so i'm definitely not alone in what we saw.
content.summary: During northern lights an orb was observed inan arch pattern going from south to north.

content.detailedDescription:
Un padre y su hijo el pasado lunes 22 de junio (2015) capturaron imã¡genes de lo que parece una flotilla de objetos voladores no identificados.

segãºn informes, el avistamiento se registrã³ a las 5:00 am. en perãº, especã­ficamente en la ciudad de tarma, ubicada a 144 millas al este de lima.

con 10 minutos de duraciã³n, el vã­deo que fue subido a youtube muestra seis luces blancas redondas aparentemente flotando en el cielo. se logran escuchar los comentarios de los testigos acerca del evento que estaban presenciando.

esto es lo que comentan los testigos:
â€œprimero parece uno, despuã©s desapareceâ€�, dice el testigo mã¡s joven. â€œâ¿son cinco? â¿o es sã³lo uno grande?Â€�, se comienza a preguntar. â€œtengo miedo ahora. â¿crees que saben que estamos grabã¡ndolos? por favor, no me dejes.Â€�

el hombre mayor cree que las luces son de hecho parte de una nave espacial mã¡s grande o una nave nodriza.

â€œestã¡ todavã­a, completamente inmã³vil. es como que uno de mã©xicoâ€�, luego se escucha decir que su hijo parece estar de acuerdo. â€œlo que estamos viendo es sã³lo la base de la misma.Â€�

las luces luego comienzan a multiplicarse.

â€œhe visto cosas como estas durante 45 aã±osâ€�, dice el padre.

mã¡s adelante en el video las imã¡genes muestran la casa de la familia y la cara de uno de los hombres en lo que parece ser un esfuerzo por demostrar la legitimidad de las imã¡genes.

youtube . com / watch?V=xggveybazsu
content.summary: Flotilla de ovnis luminosos sobre la ciudad de tarma

content.detailedDescription:
We were on the menastash ridge elk hunting in our open camp (no tent or camper) when my husband was howling at the coyotes and they were answering back.  all of a sudden it got really quiet then we saw this ufo above the trees.  it came over very slowly and quietly with lights around the underside.  it was so big it blocked out all the stars and got really dark.  we got so scared, we jumped into the front of our truck, rolled coats up in the windows, locked the doors and that's pretty much all we remember until we woke up the next morning after daylight.  neither one of us remember going to sleep or dreaming.  after being together for about 1 1/2 years without birth control, i ended up pregnant on that hunting trip and had a wonderful, healthy boy exactly 9 months later.  i was shocked when i found out i was pregnant.  

we both would be very interested in hypnotism to see if anything happened between the time we got in the truck to the time we woke up.  it's pretty much haunted us since.  we never reported it because we were pretty sure people would think we were off our nut, but have talked about it to family and friends over the years.  we have no photos or sketches to submit.  

have there been any other reported sightings in that area in 1980?
content.summary: Came over our camp from behind and scared us.

content.detailedDescription: Larg pulsating light moving slow shrunk to asmall red light pusated and shot up and disappeared it was larger than venus, at fist in the sky
content.summary: It was a bright white light which was moving silent then shrunk turned red and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
For the first incident i had just turnd off a state freeway to go to my house in flatwoods ky. i was coming from my then girlfriends house at the time which was in grayson ky. i remember feeling an overwhelimg sleepiness. i later woke up in a flat stretch of road coming into flatwoods ky.

the second event happened as i was on the downwind run of a landing. apprx 100 ft below us (my flight instructor and i ) saw a highy reflected silver red blood cell shaped.After we landed my instructor changed his toon and said it was a weather ballon. what i saw was not a weather ballon i have seen.
content.summary: I blacked out on a back country road, very curvy, then woke back up. saw something while taking flying classes that looked like a highly polised siler red blood cell.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1970 late one night my step dad came in and got mom up in a frantic rush. he handed her money and told her to get to her mom's in arizona... i couldn't tell you how long we were their before my uncle came over and asked to take me out to explore...And after begging mom to let me go i was finally told , ok/
 so we planed on leaving at first light the next day. it turned out to be several hours before day light.
   so about 0330 or so my uncle woke me up... i quietly got up and dressed then we wrote a note to mom and grandma so they wouldn't worry. then quietly slipped out of the house. we drove for hours and well into the day before we got to the devil's spire... or the porch step to heaven...We got out and uncle put some ropes around me and himself and we started to climb. we had been climbing for a long while when i heard him say," stop and hold on to the rocks and be still. the next thing i knew he had grabbed me and slung me around his shoulder and onto his back and tied me on. then he continued the climb... it wasn't too long before we were on top of the plat-toe....We rested in the shade next to a big rock...Uncle gave me a drink and some food and had me rest while he went back down for the rest of our supply's for the night. 
   it was later in the evening when i looked up at my uncle only to find a horrified look on his face....When i turned to look is when the beam of light came out. it was just hovering out in front of us. but next to the plat-toe away from the wall by 50 feet anyway...It hummed and had a swirlish kind of sound....As i looked i could see a window and 2 people looking at us. the next thing i know is that my uncle had grabbed me and jerked me up on to his back and ran for the rope that we had used to climb up with. we drove so fast with uncle looking over his shoulder in fear...It was later when we pulled in to grandmas did we find out that we were gone for some 3 and half days. 
   that just wasn't possible. i was nine or just ten at the time. so you can imagine the trouble i got into because of being gone for so long. what was strange was that grandma called the marshall and he came out to ask question's. he left scratching his head in disbelief and anger. apparently we were gone for some 3.5 days and the cops had been searching for us. i found out some years latter that we out on the hoppy indian reservation . in a place that was called wonderland. it was about 18 months latter my uncle would die from a very different kind of fast moving cancer. i myself have had medical issues since. 
   i wish i had proof but i have none. i wish i never would have experienced this but i did. and now i'm the only one left to tell the tale.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Uncle and i sat next to camp fire then they came. the window opened they wre looking at us.Then beam of light.Wiered stuff happend next.

content.detailedDescription:
Years ago, when i was young, some friends and i were walking to another friends place to watch the new laser disk copy of "the black hole". duuring the walk, we noticed what looked like a squadron of flying crosses, all lit by a soft yet unmistakable blue-white light. we watched for several minutes, during which we continued our walk, while this group of object flew lazily by overhead. while a long way from a professional or an expert.. i have seen many airplanes and helicopters in my life and can honestly say i have never seen an aircraft with a solid cross shape light that appears to cover the belly of the craft. they flew in formation, with one in front and one at the back, three in the middle and two between the middle line and the front/rear craft. 

   0
  0 0    <===== this is what it looked like, with the "points" directed
 0 0 0          more or less north/south.
  0 0
   0
content.summary: Saw a "squad", of flying crosses.

content.detailedDescription: It was tuesday evening of march 15 1987, in a small town called roland, ok.,just 7 miles west of fort smith , ar. my husband, 2 children and myself had been living in roland for 3 years. at .Approximately 9:30 pm, after having  put the children to bed, i decided to drive to a convenience store . it was located on hwy,64  west about 1 mile from our home, to buy some snacks to watch a movie on tv . on the way ther, with the windows rolled down, i noticed that it was un usally quiet with  little to no traffic in sight . i truned  into the parking lot and parked the car and stepped out to go into the store. when i went in i noticed there was no one except the store clerk and myself. she was on the phone talking to someone so i decided, to go out side and wait . as i stepped out side i looked around, at which time i looked up and noticed a huge object with rotating multi-colored lights that appeared to be as large as a football field . the elevation of the object seemed to be between 100 to 500 feet up .The lights flashed sequentially.I stood there looking at it in amazement realizing i was looking at a ufo. the object, i felt,was observing me i stood there motionless and calm for a minute or two . i turn and went back inside to tell the clerk to step out side with me to see if she could see what i was seeing in the sky . she said yes i will .We walked out together and i tould her to look in the same direction that i was looking . i ask her do you see that object ? .She said yes i do ,she paused for a brief moment at which she turn and went back in.At which time i took my eyes off the object for a second and looked up again ,and it had vanished with out a trace. i walked back in the store and purchased the snacks i came for and left to go back home. when i arrived home i got out of the car ,went in, at which time i tould my husband what i had seen. his comment was "you did ? he looked at me puzzled like he didn't belive me. a couple of nights later ,             around 10:30pm we were getting ready to go to bed. the lights were off , at which time , i decided to look out the bedroom window which was facing north and saw at a  distance  the same object  i had seen two nights  before. i tould  my husband to come and look , he did . by the time he came to see the object, it had disappeared from sight. about three weeks later  , we watched on tv a documentary on ufo"s on the program it showed different shapes of ufo"s . while watching the program i was able to identify the same ufo object that i had seen recently befor. i pointed my finger to it and said, "that's it! that is what i saw!"
content.summary: Witnesses ufo at convenience store above high lines  along hwy, 64

content.detailedDescription: Family at home friends came over to point out what they were seeing in sky so we did was very suprised at what we were witnessing there were 3 to 4 orange to me acorn shape objects to the south it was a little before dusk we all stood in amazment unfortunatly nobody had camera then , but it did make the tv news so we new we were not the only people that had seen them this occured about ten years ago now wish mufon was known to me then. the media blew it off as flares no way seen many of those while in army.
content.summary: Family at our house a friends family drove over from a few miles away to point them out

content.detailedDescription: Was traveling north on bellingrath road about a mile from bellingrath gardens and right past delchamps road. as i went around the bend of the road noticed a glimmer of light out of the right side of my windshield in the sky which at first i thought was a reflection of a plane. when my eyes focused on the object which i believe was 500 to 1000 feet away i realized it was not a plane. it was cylindrical in shape so i stopped to see what it was. when i got out of the car it appeared to be stationary. the object looked to be 30-100 feet long. two dark stripes evenly spaced on the object and it had what looked to be be 4-5 black circles in the middle of the craft which i guess could be considered windows. i wiewed the object in disbelief for around 2 minutes. it eventually started to move due east at a constant speed and i lost sight of it in the trees.I did see a helicopter heading in the oposite direction a half mile down the road as i left wondering if they had seen the same thing. i was in total disbelief and could not believe no one else noticed it. while i was stopped 2-3 cars passed by behind me but i could not take my eyes off of this thing. it was so strange. i figured when i got out of the car that i would eventually see wings or something on it but it was just hanging there in the sky like an extended shiny can of beans with no label. that is the best way i can describe it. my heart is still racing after some time not seeing wings on this thing.The object looked to be metallic in nature and emitted no sound.I will never forget this day.
content.summary: Traveling north on bellingrath road in theodore , al.  about a mile from bellingrath gardens and right past delchamps road observed a cylindrical object hovering over marsh and river. pulled over to get a better look and observed object  for 2 minutes .

content.detailedDescription: I thought it was a plane but it surely was not. the object was so hard to describe as i have never ever in my life seen an object like this .It looked rectangular and grayish in color, a little hazy. it hovered in the sky and moved very slowly, for about ten minutes, then i did not see it anymore.
content.summary: Saw ufo hovering very slowly over buildings during the day
